Class NullSafe

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.confluent.ksql.execution.codegen.helpers.NullSafe

  • public final class NullSafe
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper functions around null handling

      • apply

        public static <I,O> O apply(I input,
                            java.util.function.Function<I,O> mapper)
        Helper to guard a non-null-safe mapper function.
        Type Parameters:
        I - the input type
        O - the output type
        Parameters:
        input - the input value.
        mapper - the mapper to call if non-null.
        Returns:
        the return value of the mapper, or null.

      • applyOrDefault

        public static <I,O> O applyOrDefault(I input,
                                     java.util.function.Function<I,O> mapper,
                                     O defaultValue)
        Helper to guard a non-null-safe mapper function, or defaultValue if the value is null.
        Type Parameters:
        I - the input type
        O - the output type
        Parameters:
        input - the input value.
        mapper - the mapper to call if non-null.
        defaultValue - the value to return if null.
        Returns:
        the return value of the mapper, or defaultValue.

      • generateApply

        public static java.lang.String generateApply(java.lang.String inputCode,
                                             java.lang.String mapperCode,
                                             java.lang.Class<?> returnType)
        Generate the code for wrapping a non-null-safe lambdaBody in a null-safe apply(I, java.util.function.Function<I, O>) call.
        Parameters:
        inputCode - the input code.
        mapperCode - the mapper code.
        returnType - the type the mapper returns.
        Returns:
        the code to wrap the mapper in apply(I, java.util.function.Function<I, O>)

      • generateApplyOrDefault

        public static java.lang.String generateApplyOrDefault(java.lang.String inputCode,
                                                      java.lang.String mapperCode,
                                                      java.lang.String defaultValueCode,
                                                      java.lang.Class<?> returnType)
        Generate the code for wrapping a non-null-safe lambdaBody in a null-safe applyOrDefault(I, java.util.function.Function<I, O>, O) call.
        Parameters:
        inputCode - the input code.
        mapperCode - the mapper code.
        defaultValueCode - the default value code.
        returnType - the type the mapper returns.
        Returns:
        the code to wrap the mapper in applyOrDefault(I, java.util.function.Function<I, O>, O)
